description_html: TUUCI is pleased to announce the introduction of an ambient LED lighting option for our MAX cantilever collections. This new lighting solution combines state-of-the-art LED fixtures, modular low voltage wiring and “touch” ease of operation and dimming features. The cutting edge ambient LED light illuminates upwards into the canopy to distribute light evenly underneath the umbrella. The easy to use touch control system allows for on-off and dimming features to be activated by touching the finial underneath the umbrella.
